values.about_text:
This is an Application to type Indian Languages with full speed and accuracy.
For more information refer to {0}App's Website{1}.
values.shoonyam:
Use .q (zero width joiner) to seperate consonant clusters.
For eg:- k.xyA(or kyA)➠क्या , k.x.qyA➠क्‌या
 .x is halant here, See Table Above.
values.no_prvrtn: Write Between #^ and ^# to prevent Transliteration.
